content.en: Energy-efficient algorithms: Researchers are exploring ways to reduce energy consumption in real-time systems by modifying algorithms. They are investigating techniques such as dynamic voltage scaling, power-aware scheduling, and energy-aware modeling. These algorithms aim to achieve significant energy savings while maintaining real-time deadline guarantees in embedded systems.
content.da: Energieffektive algoritmer: Forskere undersøger måder at reducere energiforbruget i realtidssystemer ved at ændre algoritmer. De undersøger teknikker som dynamisk spændingsskalering, strømbevist planlægning og energibevidst modellering. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at opnå betydelige energibesparelser, samtidig med at de opretholder realtidsdeadline-garantier i indlejrede systemer.
